title: Russia hikes rate to 20% in emergency move, tells companies to sell FX - Reuters
content: Russia hikes rate to 20% in emergency move, tells companies to sell FX  Reuters
description: The Russian central bank raised its key interest rate to 20% from 9.5% on Monday in an emergency move, and authorities told export-focused companies to be ready to sell foreign currency as the rouble tumbled to record lows.
